page.title: 06Entertainment Priors Marston
page.content: The best entertainment is often self-generated, such as the{Christmas {Variety Show}where a wide range of local "talent" was displayed. The{WI Entertainment Group}amused the Senior Citizens Annual Christmas Party, performed for fellow members & took part in a WI drama festival. Priors Marston{First School produced a{Nativity}Play in Church. Villagers associated with{musical groups outside Priors Marston organised{concerts}in a summer garden, & in the Moravian & Parish Churches. An evening of{Magic}was given by members of Leamington Magic Circle. { Dances}are popular & profitable, & often have a theme (decor & dress), e.g. Indian evening; "40's" Evening; Blitz Dance; Square Dance; Barn Dance. In summer a barbecue often provides the food.
